DOC.brief_summary: Patellofemoral Pain Syndrome ( PFPS ) one common health-related complaint today 's society . Myofascial pain syndrome ( MPS ) attribute main cause primary source musculoskeletal pain . Trigger point vastus lateralis muscle may pull patella superiorly laterally , increase compression patellofemoral joint physical activity , result PFPS anterior knee pain . The purpose study investigate effect Dry Needling & kinesio tape trigger point vastus lateralis muscle PFPS subject .
